query:
INSERT INTO realtime.alert_translation (
                        alert_id,
                        section,
                        format,
                        language,
                        text
                    )
                    SELECT
                        unnest($1::uuid[]),
                        unnest($2::alert_section[]),
                        unnest($3::alert_format[]),
                        unnest($4::text[]),
                        unnest($5::text[])
                    ON CONFLICT (alert_id, section, format, language) DO UPDATE SET text = EXCLUDED.text
